Date First Available October 9, 2016

Price: $3.99 - $3.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:09:07 UTC – Details)


VIBRANT DESIGN: The bright and colorful Aim High Notepad brings a fun and happy touch to your daily school routine or goal-making list and is a delightful replacement to your typical stationery. 
WHAT’S INCLUDED: Every decorative notepad includes 50 pages that are perfect for teacher, parent, and student use. 
CREATIVE VERSATILITY: Carson Dellosa’s conveniently sized small notepads can be used for reminders, calendar notes, homework notes, and to set your everyday schedule. 
DIMENSIONS: Each fun and colorful notepad measures 5.75-inch by 6.25-inch. They are the ideal size for a quick note or a small sketch pad and make a personal addition to your themed classroom or your office space. 
DURABILITY: Each pad contains acid and lignin-free paper to ensure that each color stays vibrant and doesn’t become brittle with handling at home or in the classroom.
Inspirational Note Pads: Organize your daily and long-term notes, to-do list, and more with an inspirational daily planner notepad using Carson Dellosa’s Aim High Notepad.
What’s Included: The planner pad features 50 sheets of lined paper that say “MAKE IT HAPPEN!” with “Super Important”, “Then, Do This”, and “Chill, This Can Wait” to do list sections—perfect for teacher gifts or a daily to do notepad.
Notepad Dimensions: The to-do list notepad measures 5.75” x 6.25”—perfect for home office organization, classroom organization, a desk notepad, meeting notes, school supplies for college students, and other stationery needs.
Versatile Stationary Supplies: The pad of paper is great for office supplies, college supplies, classroom supplies, and work from home essentials. Use the note pad as a project organizer and homework organizer, create lists, write notes, and more.
Why Carson Dellosa: For more than 40 years, Carson Dellosa has provided solutions for parents and teachers to help their children get ahead and exceed learning goals. Carson Dellosa supports your child’s educational journey every step of the way.

The daily planner notepad features 3 organized sections to keep track of all of your short- and long-term to-do’s, including:

  • Super Important
  • Then, Do This
  • Chill, This Can Wait

Read more

STAY ORGANIZED FROM ANYWHERE

From the office or the classroom to your home, take your notepad on-the-go or style it on your desk with ease.

EVERYDAY ORGANIZATION

Features 50 sheets of lignin-free, acid free paper to track your notes, tasks, goals, to-lists, and more.

DESIGNS FOR EVERY STYLE AND SEASON

Make organization fun and festive with holiday and seasonal notepads, or incorporate designs that add to your favorite classroom theme!

Read more

Product Description

2023-2024 Desk Calendar – 18 Months Large Monthly Desk Calendar, 17″x 12″ , Janaury 2023-June 2023

Advantage of 2023-2024 desk calendar

18 months from Janaury 2023- June 2024 are covered.Premium paper is ink-proof and avoids feathering.Can be used as a desk calendar or a wall calendarPages size: 17″ x 12″.Pages color: 6 fashion elements, very beautiful

Detailed introduction introduction of the 2023-2024 desk calendar page

Julian DatesHolidays ReminderAmple Ruled Writing Blocks 1.8″ x 2″Referencing Calendar for 18 MonthsNotes Section

Rich colors

Reject boring and monotonous, add richer colors to life.

2 Hanging holes

It can be used as a wall calendar or a desk calendar, suitable for living room, classroom, office.

Two corner protectors

2 clear corner protector efficiently reduce dog-eared pages and make the desk calendar pages easily manageable, avoid curling.

High-quality thick paper

Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.

Improve time management skills

Recording what needs to be done on the desk calendar 2023-2024 can be a good reminder

MONTHLY OVERVIEW – 18 months desk calendar covers from Jan. 2023 – Jun. 2024. Monthly overview in every page (17″ x 12″), can plan a better future life. Julian dates and highlighting help remind you of every important day.
SUFFICIENT LINED BLOCKS – This desk calendar 2023-2024 offers you the large, ruled daily blocks, so the important things can be recorded on this desk calendar to remind you of them. Each month features daily block( 1.8″ x 2″) with Julian dates and holidays.And it also contains the notes section, you can record some extra content.
HIGH QUALITY THICK PAPER -The paper of this 2023-2024 desk calendar is thick enough to resist the damage of light and air. Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.
EXCELLENT DESIGN – The desk calendar/wall calendar has rich colors and 6 different page designs, rejecting monotony and bringing more fun to life. In addition, two transparent corners can keep the page flat and prevent paper curling, and two hanging holes can also turn the desk calendar into a wall calendar.
MAKES YOUR LIFE EFFECTIVE – You can write down the things you need to deal with in your life in this 2023-2024 calendar to track your daily to-do list to remind you of tasks and promote them to be completed in the near future. It can also be used to mark important holidays and appointments. This desk calendar is a great life assistant.

BooQool

  2. School & Office Supplies

  3. Bible Journaling Supplies

    Visit the Store

  4. Art Supplies

    Visit the Store

  5. Welcome to Mr. Pen!

    Having firsthand experience teaching in at-risk schools in different parts of the United States, seeing the daily struggles of students and teachers, we, a few business-minded teachers, founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose: serving the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

  6. Our Goal:

    We founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose to serve the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

    We want to ensure Mr. Pen can provide superior quality, the most affordable products, and amazing online shopping experience from the beginning.

    As we aim to supply excellent conventional office and school products, our team of engineers and designers will do their best job to create innovative solutions for offices and schools to maximize efficiency and learning.

Manufacturer Charty Party, LLC

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $34.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:50:31 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Meet Ransom Notes, the creative party game for making hilariously terrible sentences.

Ransom Notes is a laugh-out-loud, always fresh game where you compete against your friends to answer outlandish prompts from a limited pool of word magnets.

Designed for 3-6 players, Ransom Notes is perfect for game nights group that want a game as absurd as it is clever.

Hilariously unique every time.

With 250 absurd prompt cards and a different pool of word magnets every time, players end up creating an infinite variety of terribly awesome sentences.

Learn to play in one minute.

Just take a few handfuls of word magnets, flip over a prompt card, and start playing — no long instructions to explain.

A creative twist on party games.

Ransom notes isn’t just a play a card, judge picks the winner party game — players are constantly engaged in creative, out-of-the-box thinking that will have you crying from laughing.

Always unique and hilarious!

Ransom Notes is perfect for game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

Make it your own.

Ransom Notes is perfect for adult game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game is rated 17+ for some adult content, but can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

As clean or dirty as the people playing. Mostly.

Ransom Notes is perfect for adult game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game is rated 17+ for some adult content, but can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

Meet Ransom Notes, the game of hilariously terrible sentences! Players use word magnets to respond to outlandish prompts like “Tell someone you’ve clogged their toilet at a party” with just their limited pool of words
With 250 absurd prompt cards and a new pool of words every time, this party game has infinite hilarious combinations and feels fresh every time you play
Learn to play in under one minute, and even the shyest players will be creating laugh-out-loud word magnet responses right away
For 3-6 players, but equally hilarious when larger groups team up together. 30-90 min play time
A funny party game gift for adult game night, family game nights, bachelorette parties
Includes: 840 high quality word magnets, 6 metal submission cards, 250 prompt cards, and instructions

COLORFUL LINED: The new fashion comes with lines, 6 pads, 3×3 inch, 6 different colors with black auxiliary wire transparent clearly visible sticky notes. (300 sheets)
FRIENDLY HELPFUL HINTS: In order to get a better user’s experience, we recommend you to use pencils, ballpoint pens, oil-based markers, （Not recommended to use pens, water-based pens, gel pens, common markers, unless you can wait for handwriting to dry after using water-based pen. Do not wipe handwriting immediately)
EXTENSIVE USE: These new lined transparent sticky notes are popular and can be used for everything from notes, daily home tips, classification management notes pads, study & reading annotating message reminders, research & business meetings memos, and more.
FEATURE OF NOTES：Small and lightweight, you can carry it everywhere. Such as:Universities, offices, schools, libraries, LABS, parties, etc. The black lines help you write neatly and make note-taking look good.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of high transparency & can write PET material allows you to see the text and information on the bottom when pasted on books, notebooks, computers, notes, etc. It’s your work, study and scientific research daily life supplies.
